ARABIC: فَإِنْ عَصَوْكَ فَقُلْ إِنِّى بَرِىٓءٌ مِّمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: If they disobey you, say, 'I am free of what you do.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: If they do not obey you, tell them: "I am not responsible for what you do."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then if they disobey you say to them: "I am quit of what you do."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: If they disobey you, tell them, "I condemn your disobedient deeds".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So if they do not obey you, then say, “Indeed I am unconcerned with what you do.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then if they disobey you, say: "I am innocent of what you do."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But if they disobey you, then say: Surely I am clear of what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then, if they disobey thee, say, 'I am quit of that you do.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And if they (thy kinsfolk) disobey thee, say: Lo! I am innocent of what they do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: If they disobey you, say, "I bear no responsibility for what you do."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And if they disobey thee, say thou: verily I am quit of that which ye work.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But if they disobey you, say, ‘I am absolved of what you do.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then if they disobey thee, say: "I am free (of responsibility) for what ye do!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then if they disobey you, say: "I am innocent of what you do."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: If they disobey you, say: 'I am quit of what you do'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And if they disobey you, say, “I am innocent of what you do.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And if they disobey you, then say, "Indeed, I am disassociated from what you are doing."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:216] But if they, your kinsfolk, disobey you, say, to them: ‘I am absolved of what you do’, in worshipping [gods] other than God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And if they) the Quraysh (disobey thee, say: Lo! I am innocent of what they do) and say.
